languages.text: "Они поют? Удивительно, что ваша раса дошла до столь гармоничной формы взаимодействия с рукотворными инструментами. Мои сородичи также используют психоакустические гармоники, чтобы направлять наши творения. Я не являюсь костопевцем, но, возможно, могла бы подсказать определенные... принципы звучания вселенной твоим слугам".

"Are they singing? It is surprising that your race was able to achieve such a harmonious form of interaction with man-made tools. My kinsmen also use psycho-acoustic harmonicas to guide our creations. I'm not a bone-singer myself, but I might be able to tell your servants of certain... principles regarding how the universe sounds."
languages.original_text: "Они поют? Удивительно, что ваша раса дошла до столь гармоничной формы взаимодействия с рукотворными инструментами. Мои сородичи также используют психоакустические гармоники, чтобы направлять наши творения. Я не являюсь костопевцем, но, возможно, могла бы подсказать определенные... принципы звучания вселенной твоим слугам".

traits.locale_text: "Are they singing? It is surprising that your race had reached such a harmonious form of interaction with the man-made tools. My kinsmen also use the psycho-acoustic harmonicas to guide our creations. I'm not a bone-singer myself, but I might be able to tell your servants of the certain... principles of how the universe sounds."

"Are they singing? It is surprising that your race had reached such a harmonious form of interaction with the man-made tools. My kinsmen also use the psycho-acoustic harmonicas to guide our creations. I'm not a bone-singer myself, but I might be able to tell your servants of the certain... principles of how the universe sounds."

"Are they singing? It is surprising that your race was able to achieve such a harmonious form of interaction with man-made tools. My kinsmen also use psycho-acoustic harmonicas to guide our creations. I'm not a bone-singer myself, but I might be able to tell your servants of certain... principles regarding how the universe sounds."

"Are they singing? It is surprising that your race was able to achieve such a harmonious form of interaction with man-made tools. My kinsmen also use psycho-acoustic harmonicas to guide our creations. I'm not a bone-singer myself, but I might be able to tell your servants of certain... principles regarding how the universe sounds."

"Are they singing? It is surprising that your race was able to achieve such a harmonious form of interaction with man-made tools. My kinsmen also use psycho-acoustic harmonicas to guide our creations. I'm not a bone-singer myself, but I might be able to tell your servants of certain... principles regarding how the universe sounds."

languages.text: “他们是在唱歌吗？真令人惊讶，你的种族居然能与人造工具实现如此和谐的互动。我的族人也会通过灵能传声琴来指导我们的创作。我自己并不是吟骨者，但或许，我可以告诉你的仆人们某些……关于宇宙之声的原理。”
languages.original_text: "Are they singing? It is surprising that your race was able to achieve such a harmonious form of interaction with man-made tools. My kinsmen also use psycho-acoustic harmonicas to guide our creations. I'm not a bone-singer myself, but I might be able to tell your servants of certain... principles regarding how the universe sounds."

traits.locale_text: “他们是在唱歌吗？真令人惊讶，你的种族居然能与人造工具实现如此和谐的互动。我的族人也会通过灵能传声琴来指导我们的创作。我自己并不是吟骨者，但或许，我可以告诉你的仆人们某些……关于宇宙之声的原理。”

languages.text: «¿Están cantando? Es sorprendente que tu raza sea capaz de lograr una forma tan armoniosa de interacción con herramientas hechas por el hombre. Mis parientes también utilizan armónicas psicoacústicas para guiar nuestras creaciones. Yo no puedo cantarle al hueso, pero podría hablar con tus sirvientes de ciertos... principios sobre cómo suena el universo».
languages.original_text: "Are they singing? It is surprising that your race was able to achieve such a harmonious form of interaction with man-made tools. My kinsmen also use psycho-acoustic harmonicas to guide our creations. I'm not a bone-singer myself, but I might be able to tell your servants of certain... principles regarding how the universe sounds."

traits.locale_text: «¿Están cantando? Es sorprendente que tu raza sea capaz de lograr una forma tan armoniosa de interacción con herramientas hechas por el hombre. Mis parientes también utilizan armónicas psicoacústicas para guiar nuestras creaciones. Yo no puedo cantarle al hueso, pero podría hablar con tus sirvientes de ciertos... principios sobre cómo suena el universo».

languages.text: 「彼らは歌っているのでしょうか？あなた方の種族が、人工の道具を使ってこのような調和のとれた相互作用を達成できるとは、驚くべきことです。私の親族も、超能力音響ハーモニカを使って創作を指導していますよ。私自身はボーンシンガーではありませんが、宇宙の音に関するある種の...原理なら、あなたの従者にお伝えすることができそうです」
languages.original_text: "Are they singing? It is surprising that your race was able to achieve such a harmonious form of interaction with man-made tools. My kinsmen also use psycho-acoustic harmonicas to guide our creations. I'm not a bone-singer myself, but I might be able to tell your servants of certain... principles regarding how the universe sounds."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らは歌っているのでしょうか？あなた方の種族が、人工の道具を使ってこのような調和のとれた相互作用を達成できるとは、驚くべきことです。私の親族も、超能力音響ハーモニカを使って創作を指導していますよ。私自身はボーンシンガーではありませんが、宇宙の音に関するある種の...原理なら、あなたの従者にお伝えすることができそうです」

languages.text: « Sont-ils en train de chanter ? Je m'étonne que votre race soit parvenue à une forme d'interaction si harmonieuse avec des outils fabriqués par la main de l'homme. Mes semblables emploient également des harmonicas psychoacoustiques pour guider nos processus créatifs. Je ne maîtrise pas l'art des Chanteurs de Moelle, mais je pourrais peut-être exposer à vos serviteurs certains des... principes qui régissent les lois sonores de l'univers. »
languages.original_text: "Are they singing? It is surprising that your race was able to achieve such a harmonious form of interaction with man-made tools. My kinsmen also use psycho-acoustic harmonicas to guide our creations. I'm not a bone-singer myself, but I might be able to tell your servants of certain... principles regarding how the universe sounds."

traits.locale_text: « Sont-ils en train de chanter ? Je m'étonne que votre race soit parvenue à une forme d'interaction si harmonieuse avec des outils fabriqués par la main de l'homme. Mes semblables emploient également des harmonicas psychoacoustiques pour guider nos processus créatifs. Je ne maîtrise pas l'art des Chanteurs de Moelle, mais je pourrais peut-être exposer à vos serviteurs certains des... principes qui régissent les lois sonores de l'univers. »

languages.text: "Singen sie? Es überrascht mich, dass Eure Spezies mit menschengemachten Werkzeugen in der Lage war, eine solch harmonische Form der Interaktion zu erreichen. Meine Verwandten setzen ebenfalls psycho-akustische Harmonikas ein, um unsere Schöpfungen zu führen. Ich selbst bin keine Knochensängerin, doch ich kann Euren Dienern vielleicht gewisse ... Prinzipien näherbringen, wie das Universum klingt."
languages.original_text: "Are they singing? It is surprising that your race was able to achieve such a harmonious form of interaction with man-made tools. My kinsmen also use psycho-acoustic harmonicas to guide our creations. I'm not a bone-singer myself, but I might be able to tell your servants of certain... principles regarding how the universe sounds."
